alert.note: Alert for Columbia; McDuffie; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 11:29PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of McDuffie, Columbia and central Richmond Counties through 1215 AM EDT... At 1129 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Warrenton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grovetown, Evans, Thomson, Fort Gordon, Martinez, Harlem, Appling, South Augusta, Riverwood, Mistletoe State Park, Thomson-McDuffie County Airport, Dearing, Liberty Park Community Center, Sweetwater Park, Winfield, Arties Pond Public Fishing Area, Glenn Hills, McDuffie County Fire Department, Adamsville and Thomson Fire Department. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 167 and 195. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 3 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
